main event: A witness reported a sighting of a stationary light in the sky that suddenly vanished after approximately 15 minutes, ending with a rapid ascent through clouds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on October 8, 1959, at 0315Z,The light was observed for over 30 minutes and was reported to be high in the sky,The witness provided a detailed letter to Project Blue Book addressing the sighting,The report states that the object was unable to be classified as any known aircraft or astronomical body,An indentation on the ground was found at the sighting location the next morning.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The witness was a department store manager with a college education.
